directions: In a large skillet, over medium-high heat; heat olive oil, add onions, garlic, jalapeno, cilantro; basil cook 3-5 minutes. Add limes juice, Clamato(R); bring to boil. Reduce heat, cover and simmer slowly.
Season salmon fillets with salt and pepper, place in Clamato(R) broth; cook fillets 9-12 minutes. Serve with white rice and vegetables.
ingredients: 1 fresh jalapeno chile, seeded and minced
title: Clamato® Cooked Salmon
